CREATE.CREATE_TODO_TABLE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `todo-list` (`own_user` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL,`subject` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,`status` TINYINT(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, INDEX `userid` (`own_user`), CONSTRAINT `userid` FOREIGN KEY (`own_user`) REFERENCES `user` (`userid`))COLLATE='utf8_general_ci'ENGINE=InnoDB;
